es.ull.datamining.core

Class AttributeNumeric

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ull.datamining.core.Attribute
      • es.ull.datamining.core.AttributeNumeric

  • public class AttributeNumeric
extends Attribute
    Specific attribute extended of the Attribute abstract class. Implements all optional operations.
    Author:
    Ivan Steven Ramirez Ladino (alu0100537321@ull.edu.es)
